title: The American War Machine of WWII  1/5 The Army
description:
The American War Machine of WWII  1/5 The Army

This is the story of the creation of the American Military from the small 100000 man force of the post WWI era to the mighty military industrial complex that fought fascist forces around the world.

Disc 1:
This DVD details the hardware and tactics of the U.S. Army who, in the 1930s, lacked machine guns and tanks. The soldiers marched with sticks for lack of rifles but in the end battled their way to victory around the world.
